job.title: Operations Engineer, Contractor Private Cloud (VMware)
job.description:
Operations Engineer, Contractor Private Cloud (VMware)

 

Responsibilities:

  • Support the VMware IaaS platform and supporting infrastructure across the globe and ensure consistent availability.
  • This includes:
  • Using existing automation tools to perform day-to-day operations duties
  • Develop automation to continue to drive proactive detection and remediation of issues
  • Identify and tackle hardware/software issues with vendors
  • Respond to inquiries and requests from other teams
  • Facilitate ticket creation and ticket assignment
  • Enforce change control processes
  • Maintain good documentation and templates

 

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience supporting a 24x7 production environment
  • 5+ years of experience building and maintaining VMware vSphere 6.x platforms
  • 3+ years coding Python
  • Have working experience with Ansible, git, Jenkins, Atlassian products
  • Other Qualifications
  • Experience and knowledge in Linux support and administration
  • Experience running a fleet of servers, FC switches and storage
  • Experience with HashiCorp Vault is a plus
  • Must possess excellent written and verbal skills
